website_summaries.verdict: This 3-person launcher tosses water balloons up to 120 yd.
pros: Must be launched by a 3-person team
cons: The tubing has been known to snap
The  balloon pouch may be made of denim instead of canvas, so it could be less sturdy than expected

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Oddly I am using it as a food catapult to feed fish and turltes in my pond at Winterpast Farm Petting Zoo in Wake Forst NC. Using it for cereal, bread, lettuce and crackers. Built a frame. All ages LOVING it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Droessler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fun and Great Launch Power
customer_reviews.text: We had a family reunion near a large natural lake. Our children and grandchildren (not to mention other people on the beach and in the lake) had a blast as we launched the rubber chickens, also purchased from Amazon, from the beach out into the lake. Our family and others enjoyed racing to the chicken for retrieval and passing back to the balloon launchers. Our object was to see who could get the featherless chickens to fly the furthest. The launchers worked great! They were easy to handle, took some real stretching and never broke or skipped a beat. We packed them up to use again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Paul from Sanger, CA

customer_reviews.title: Works well....has good range for our use.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids (and grandad) had a blast launching apples and corn across creek to feed the deer. We were happy...deer were happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order extra ballons!
customer_reviews.text: The launcher is not the issue. The issue is that I did not get the items that the description stated were inclosed. The 100 balloons were not in the package and neither was the hise adapter. This was for a kids party on Monday. No time to do a return. But I however like to play it safe and smart. I also ordered 1200 pack of balloons that came with 3 each hose adapter. Although I was a let to fix I am still a little miffed about paying for something and not getting as described
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Ford

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product description
customer_reviews.text: The product description shows that the launcher comes with 100 balloons and a hose adapter. It did not. If this matters to you as it mattered to me (I would place a reasonable value of an adapter and balloons at a few dollars), then it will be an issue. The product being described is inaccurate to a point where it effects the value I assumed it had when I bought it. For that alone I cannot give it a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: So happy we found this again!
customer_reviews.text: We had this one years ago and it worked great and lasted several years; but, unfortunately, we forgot where we purchased it. My kids have tested many of these launchers over the years and liked this one the most. We bought many different brands but they all kept breaking. Leaving them outside most of the summer, many brands dry rotted. I think the key to this one is the surgical tubing; it lasts so much longer than the others we tried. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great sling shot launcher
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun with this. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this for any party
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for any party! We had a Hoedown and launched 12oz corn filled bags into a field. Our 50 guests loved it after about 5 hours the seam started ripping but the party was pretty much over. well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We used to launch frozen water balloons into the lake (removed the balloon part first of course). Was fun, got some good distances. Made some folks nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We use it to fling old apples at trees in the woods. Our 15 year loves it as well as the 8 and 9 year old. It’s fun for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fager

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water balloon launcher
customer_reviews.text: I chose this water balloon launcher based on others reviews. We used it on our school's end of year field day. We launched over 200 balloons. Tips from other sites and products also apply here. DO NOT LET PEOPLE TRY TO CATCH THE LAUNCHED BALLOONS. Regularly straightening out the pocket is key to successful launches. keeping the size of the water balloons to tennis ball size is also key. well made product.
customer_reviews.author: jjl

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what you think
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, and works very well. It's very powerful. In fact, we broke a neighbor's window with it quite easily; an unintended consequence of a little too much fun. But it shows how strong it is. My 10, 8, and 4 year olds had a blast, as did the rest of the neighbor kids. Don't shoot at the 4 year old, and you really don't want to get hit with it, but just the idea of launching them in the direction is quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: steven berzins

customer_reviews.title: Balloons were flying!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun for kids at my son's 7th birthday. We had two dads operate the sides of it. I think it would be too hard for kids that age to really do it themselves. They got to pull it back and launch though. Really sends the balloons flying!
customer_reviews.author: 2-Step

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We attached them to metal poles and stuck them in the ground. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great hedgeapple tosser!
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality bands, tosses hedgeapples a long way. I'd assume it'll work just as well for water balloons. Good stitching on the pocket. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Will England

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hot summer day!
customer_reviews.text: You can't hold this in your hand without smiling. It takes 3 people to launch a balloon if you want it to really go far! We have a raft out on a lake that made the perfect target! I'm not sure we've gotten it to go 120 yards, but we have had a ton of fun trying! Great for lobbing water balloons over the top of the house to get the kids on the other side, and perfect for self defense against super soakers.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrus

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: A simple yet fun toy. Great fun on lakes and beaches! The surgical style tubing is durable and should last for quite some time if cared for properly. The handles are decently padded. Careful not to over stretch the tubing or it will break. Overall it gets the (insert object here) launching job done.
customer_reviews.author: SilhouetteZ28

customer_reviews.title: 120 Yard Balloon Launcher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a preteen party. I live outside city limits, in the county, so I have plenty of room. The kids had a lot of fun with it. I set up a target on a section of chain link dog kennel panel to encourage shooting at a target rather than each other. Lots of fun...especially for boys this age! I liked the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These launchers are so much fun, I've used the launchers for the last 3 years at my church's youth camp. Great product. Good materials. Took about 2 1/2 years before one of the launchers to finally break on me. For most sizes coming in under $15 you can't complain. It's simply fun, durable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: M. Foust

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids.  And grown men.
customer_reviews.text: We brought this on a beach trip with the cousins and it was a HUGE hit. The whole neighborhood came out to watch us launch balloons!! Since I brought this to the beach I have purchased several to give as gifts (along with a package of water balloons). It is a popular gift for kids of ALL ages and is a great family activity. Everywhere we bring this thing, people ask where they can buy one for themselves. I should also add that grown men have a ridiculously good time with this toy. My husband and brother-in-law were out in the backyard bombing away, cackling to themselves, throwing bets. My favorite toy purchase of the year!!
customer_reviews.author: Boomerang

customer_reviews.title: the kids just love this launcher
customer_reviews.text: My family had a blast with this one afternoon, the kids just love this launcher! You need to teach little kids how to use properly and keep an eye on them, because if they stretch it back while holding it at eye level and it snaps back at them, it can do some damage.
customer_reviews.author: Brenaldo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it! flings the water balloons far!Great for the beach too!
customer_reviews.author: Robert McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Fun launcher!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Use it as a school project for my students. They like to fire it.
customer_reviews.author: Moka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up after much use at camps and church activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sons birthday party and it was a huge hit. Worked great with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. NicholsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Launcher
customer_reviews.text: A buddy and me attached this to the roof of his truck and we could launch footballs over 100 yards. We were going to mount it to the Mardi Gras float, but thought it might be dangerous so we scrapped that idea.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Leboeuf

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I found it tough to work by yourself and it does not shoot 100yards when using by yourself. Maybe the 200yard one would stretch more and be easier to use alone..
customer_reviews.author: EMF

customer_reviews.title: Had a blast with it.
customer_reviews.text: Item was as we expected it to be and was received within the time promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: This was a hit at my company's fall picnic! ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my company's fall picnic! We played pumpkin chunkin' with a three person team and all the adults thought it was a blast.
customer_reviews.author: KC Marie

customer_reviews.title: This rocks
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my purchase of this water balloon launcher. Whether you are 10 or 60 using this launcher will bring joy to your day and put a massive smile on your face. This launcher can be summed up into one word AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: CYMM

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, No Balloons?
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shooter is good. For the price ($12 and some change) I feel it was a good value. The product description said it came with 144 balloons plus a hose attachment to fill them. Neither of those things arrived with the product.
customer_reviews.author: CO Shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... it to throw rope over a tree branch worked great!
customer_reviews.text: used it to throw rope over a tree branch worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit of hangup
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the balloon gets hung up in the throwing pouch, but mostly this is pretty fun and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ray O. Vac

customer_reviews.title: Ton of fun
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a summer party and it was the hit of the day. Adults and kids alike loved it and played with launching balloons down our driveway. We bought a second one to use for a bigger battle next year.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my 8 year old son and his 8 and 9 year old cousins when they were visiting this summer. They played for hours and had a blast. It was a little hard for them to use with only one person in the manner described in the instructions. But they quickly figured out how to loop onto two adirondack chairs for base support, pull back and launch. Once they got the hang of it, we couldn't believe how far they shot the balloons. They literally played for hours and one said "I think I am in love with this slingshot!"
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This works great, but a word of caution
customer_reviews.text: This works great, but a word of caution: this shoots far, which means it goes fast. I shot this at some friends while at college, and I hit and broke a double pane glass window. Simply, use caution. It is very impressive though and has been really fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Good idea...but doesn't really work
customer_reviews.text: This is made sturdily. However, it is a) nearly impossible to effectively launch a water balloon without it bursting in or around the launcher and b) certainly not capable of launching the water balloons the distance indicated.
customer_reviews.author: ExplorerDad

customer_reviews.title: Fun times ahead!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and the kids had a blast!....as well as the adults
customer_reviews.author: oscar ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Totally disposable broke the first day it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Totally disposable broke the first day it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Sandspur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way fun! Great birthday gift for any third through middle schooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have loved it and we have had alot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Heslington

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER
customer_reviews.text: 9-year old birthday party ... about 10 boys + adults = hours and hours of competitive FUN! Best $10 bucks I ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Salana Yarger

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: The strong rubber tubing makes the water balloons fly high with this launcher. Great launcher, fun for lakes, rivers or big yards.
customer_reviews.author: jill rebholz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Had great fun with this launcher -- worked very well. Launching water balloons has been a family reunion favorite for many years. Had started with a "home-made" launcher years ago (bungie cords attached to a "Frisbie"), which required two poles or trees to attach it to. This launcher definitely works better!! And, no trees/poles required so is much more mobile as to where you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb & Den

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Bday gift from an older brother to a younger brother. Is super fun, works well, launches as far as it says it will. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mariongirl

customer_reviews.title: Made the party
customer_reviews.text: Got this today, set it up for my 8 year old party on two posts. Had an angry bird target setup and the kids had a blast. It is a great product, well built and withstood 25 kids for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag Launcher
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a Cornhole/Bags Charity Tournament....launched bags at a oversized board. It was the hit of the tourney and it held up perfectly shooting hundreds of 1lbs bags.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taggart

customer_reviews.title: Works great. A 10 year old can hold the balloon ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A 10 year old can hold the balloon but the ends need to be pulled by pretty big guys if you want to get over 100 yards. Very fun thing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad launcher, but the 120 yard unit might go ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad launcher, but the 120 yard unit might go (at most) 75 yards, unless you're slinging water balloons in a vaccuum. And to send it the furthest it can go, you'll need quite a strong person (adult) to pull it back and let it go. Don't think you can have a kid hold the other ends either. You MUST secure at least one side to a post or tree, otherwise you'll be lucky to have it travel 40 yards. Best case is to try and build a wooden transportable launch station that you can mount to the ground or in the dirt, and do all the launching with one person. Still, a lot of fun this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gottesman

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: Get service and fun to use at group events. I used that at a family gathering and needed a game to use to keep people entertained. The kids loved it and had fun trying to catch water balloons and getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Goettig

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The band falls apart when pulled taught. When pulled before it breaks it sends a balloon about 50'.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We never tried this as a 1 man launcher, but as a 3 man it worked great. We got way more than the 120 yards advertised.
customer_reviews.author: D. Persch

customer_reviews.title: as described..inexpensive and worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: we used this at my son's birthday party, and it worked great....the kids loved it!!! The range was accurate, and we painted a target on the grass lawn. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: B. Roek

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this now when the neighborhood kids decide they want to have a water balloon fight i will be ready.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one I purchased years ago. Although that one was a different brand, it served me well for a long time and this one seems to be of similar quality. I used it for snowballs this winter a couple times and it worked fine. I don't know how well water balloons work yet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: huge hit at my kids angry birds themed birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: So Sexy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have endless fun slinging water balloons 120 yards at fast speeds ... BUY IT NOW!! Unless you hate having fun and want to die alone.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Quite easy to launch (with three man team or better yet one person foot) Good length straps Shoots everything from eggs to pinecones to small-medium size water baloons Cons: Jean like fabric basket seems liable to tearing Basket only accomodates small- medium sized water baloons Good buy and not a bad price. Will only last as long as the basket holds and straps stay intact.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised! Kids at church had a ball with it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised! Kids at church had a ball with it! I would recommend this product to friends. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: michael showalter

customer_reviews.title: Best dangerous toy ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for one of these launchers for a while and I can't wait to take it on a float trip.
customer_reviews.author: mizzou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for random family gatherings! Launches pretty much anything and can go way farther than 120 yards!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe others are better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the distance up from this one in the summer but lost it. That one survived a week of summer camp. This one broke within 10 minutes of opening the package. I was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chocobogirl

customer_reviews.title: Water balloon launcher expert
customer_reviews.text: Great for water balloon launching and exceeded my expectations on delivery time #cool #awesome #great #fast dont miss out!!! ...
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Kern

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Do not buy it. The handles came apart and the bit that holds the balloon actually ends up wrapped around the balloon and so the balloon does not release. This was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paulfdenwood

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Launcher
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with the kids. It is well made and easy to use. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Sprague

customer_reviews.title: We had a 'blast'!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was great for our purposes. It takes three strong people to get the distance that's advertised. In our case, that was not a problem. It was for a high school football team - team building exercise. We had a 'blast'!!!
customer_reviews.author: mike sanderson

product_meta.title: CX Blaster 120 Yard Water Balloon Launcher
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackMade by the originator and Patent holder of the Water Balloon Launcher. Can be used with the one person method or the three person method. � 100% USA Made � Surgical Tubing � Heavy Duty Canvas Pouch � Rip-Proof Vinyl GripsMade in USA
feature_bullets: Launch water balloons to hit targets up to 120 yards away
Stretch-rubber tubing includes a heavy-duty launching “pouch” that can be used by 1 person or 3
Includes 1 launcher, 100 balloons, hose adapter, and complete use and safety instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
